attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is extremely depressing to hear that British fruit and vegetable farmers and supliers are going out of business because fruit and vegetables are being sourced from other countries such as Spain and France.  Supermarkets are constantly advertising locally sourced fruit and vegetables however on closer inspection the majority of fresh goods have been imported from other countries.  Its about time we supported growers at home.

rejection.details: Please remove reference to the named supermarket.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
